message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your cut decreases each round with inflation. I'm offering a bit more than half to make it worth your while to settle now.
I'll meet you halfway between my first offer and your last one. Let's settle this.
Time is running out, and the value for you keeps shrinking. This is a strong offer, let's close the deal.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share. Let's end this.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you more than half the original value, even with the inflation. Take it or leave it.
